name: Half-Life 2: Downfall
description: <strong>ABOUT</strong><br/><br/>DownFall is a FREE Half-Life 2 single-player mod taking place in the White Forest surroundings.<br/>You're once more putting on the HEV suit as Gordon Freeman. Your mission is to recover a newly developed technology by the resistance, known as the "citadel buster", before the Combine manage to destroy it.<br/><br/><br/><strong>WHAT TO EXPECT?</strong><br/><br/>A high-quality Half-Life 2 mod,taking place in new locations while staying true to Valve's design. Chapter 1 is available now, it's short but sweet, with an average playtime of ~35 minutes.<br/><br/><br/><strong>THE FUTURE</strong><br/><br/>While the initial release is short, there's an additional 2 chapters coming in the future at an estimated lengh of 40 minutes each. There is no ETA when the next chapters will release.
